name: Lex Lofthouse (@loftio@typo.social)
summary:
I hope @carol@social.lol doesn't mind me completely ripping her lifenotes format off... but I have. 

I really love reading these so I thought it's time I did my own. Blogging used to be something I did very regularly in my teens so why stop now?

https://loftio.co.uk/lifenotes-001-january-23/
